item.title: jimmysong.io website revision notice
item.description: 2020 is indeed a bad start. In less than a month, I hardly heard any good news:

item.title: Chinese version of Google Engineering Practice Documents
item.description: A few days ago during the Mid-Autumn Festival, I translated Google’s Engineering Practices documentation , which is open source on Github.

item.title: Istio 1.1 released
item.description: The following paragraph is a release note from the Istio official blog https://istio.

item.title: Donate Istio Handbook to the ServiceMesher community
item.description: Istio handbook was originally an open source e-book I created (see https://jimmysong.

item.title: Kubernetes and Istio Service Mesh Cloud Native Local Video Demo Show
item.description: This video was recorded on the last day of 2018 and demonstrates the use of rootsongjc/kubernetes-vagrant-centos-cluster to automatically deploy a Kubernetes cluster and Istio Service Mesh.

item.title: Kubecon&CloudNativeCon Seattle 2018
item.description: KubeCon & CloudNative in North America is the most worthy cloud-native event every year.

item.title: Kubernetes Handbook v1.4 is released
item.description: This is a postscript from the post- Kubernetes era.

item.title: Istio 1.0 is released
item.description: Today, we are pleased to announce

item.title: MagicSandbox Alpha released
item.description: If there is a visual learning model and platform that provides infrastructure clusters for your operation, would you pay for it?

item.title: Ballerina seeks Chinese ambassador
item.description: Remember the cloud-native programming language I shared before finally appeared!

item.title: Chinese version of the latest official document of Envoy released
item.description: Envoy-Designed for cloud-native applications, open source edge and service proxy, Istio Service Mesh default data plane, Chinese version of the latest official document, dedicated by the ServiceMesher community, welcome everyone to learn and share together.

item.title: Envoy's latest official document translation work started
item.description: Envoy is an open source L7 proxy and communication bus written in C ++ by Lyft.

item.title: Docker container network book sharing
item.description: TL; DR Click here to download the PDF of this book .

item.title: ArchSummit Beijing 2017 speech preview
item.description: In 2017, we are facing a big era of architectural changes, such as Kubernetes ending the battle for container orchestration, Kafka release 1.

item.title: Cloudinary file upload tool written in Go released
item.description: Cloudinary-go is a Go client library and CLI tool to upload static assets to the Cloudinary service.

item.title: Cloud Native slides and books sharing
item.description: Many people complain about the lack of information about Cloud Native that can be found on the Internet, so I specially compiled the information I currently save into such a GitHub repository, which will be continuously updated and improved in the future.

item.title: Hugo Handbook is released
item.description: Many people asked me how jimmysong.io made this website.

item.title: Recommend an open source website comment box tool
item.description: A website review plugin gitment is highly recommended .

item.title: New domain name jimmysong.io
item.description: From now on I have my own independent domain name jimmysong.

item.title: Awesome Cloud Native list is released
item.description: This is a list of software, tools, architecture and reference materials about Cloud Native.

item.title: Migrating to Cloud Native Chinese version released
item.description: This book is the Chinese version of Migrating to Cloud Native Application Architectures.
